sentences.sContent: ...Respect is shown by looking in the general direction but avoiding direct eye contact...
Which direction did they go in?
All work was produced by the students under the direction of John Williams.
sentences.sCn: 所有作品都是在约翰·威廉斯的指导下由学生创作完成的。

trans.tranOther: the way something or someone moves, faces, or is aimed
